title: Scripting
body:
Today i played a game of annie, people was reporting me for scripting and i wasn't. So i really want to know what things did i do that made me scripting. First the enemy team has a veigar and he used his e on me which, i then sidestepped all the skillshots (wasn't much only 2 or 3) but i still ended up dying because i was auto'ed to death. That was unfortunate. Second, shutter stepping there was a mechanic about shutter stepping and i believe it is riven's fast combo but instead on ranges for example adc, or what i also believe it is pretty much kiting, but they believe i was scripting because i was shutter stepping, but now that they call it scripting it made me very confused. Thirdly, predictions i was in my own jungle when the enemy team's zed suddenly jumped at me and i predicted where he would appear based on mind games and my prediction was correct so i w'ed him for stun then killing him off afterwards using my other abilities. There was another time when the enemy's jinx was charging up her ultimate and since there is a brief delay and a animation i saw it and zhonya'ed right away as it when through because i was untargetable. In the end after the game i was reported and got put in the lower priority queue for 5 games 20 minutes, which it doesn't feel really nice. I just want an explanation about what made them thinking about that i was scripting or did i anything that seems obvious when someone is scripting. The account i was playing on wasn't Jia1844 when i played the annie matchup it was on this account. Senpai Daisu. It would be much appreciated if someone can help me. Thanks!


Summoner Name ---- Jia1844

replies.body: If they've reported you and you've done nothing wrong, I'm quite positive that nothing would happen.

I got called out for using dodge scripts last night because I know how to not get hit by Xerath and Zac's E. This is in Diamond.

Dw my dude, if you're innocent you'll be fine. If you're guilty, I hope you get banned.

1. Being placed in low priority queue is **only** a punishment for [leaverbuste](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)r. You probably DC or were marked as AFK for some time to receive this. 

2. People get salty when  they are losing, especially when playing a champ they are good at. They throw any excuse out there to make it seem like they are in an unfair matchup. This guy is scripting/smurfing/whatever. 

Like Sekai said, if you weren't doing anything wrong you won't get punished for it + the people that falsely accused you would have their report credibility brought down.
